summary: This document is a Form W-9 and a notice from the IRS regarding the assignment of an Employer Identification Number (EIN) to the Butterfly Trust, managed by Richard Kahn. It outlines the requirements for providing taxpayer identification information and the implications of incorrect information.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is identified as the trustee of the Butterfly Trust, which is mentioned in the context of applying for an Employer Identification Number.

events.title: Assignment of Employer Identification Number
events.description: The IRS assigned an Employer Identification Number to the Butterfly Trust, managed by Richard Kahn.

keyFacts: The document includes a Form W-9 for the Butterfly Trust, indicating it is a disregarded entity.
Richard Kahn is the trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
The IRS assigned an Employer Identification Number to the Butterfly Trust on November 13, 2008.
The document outlines the importance of providing correct taxpayer identification information to avoid delays or issues with the IRS.
The notice emphasizes the need for accurate information when filing tax documents to prevent being assigned multiple EINs.
